preprocessing_note: Apply keras.applications.efficientnet.preprocess_input to RGB image (uint8 0-255) before predict.
inference_example:
import json
from tensorflow import keras
import keras.applications.efficientnet as eff
with open('best_model_config.json') as f:
    cfg = json.load(f)
model = keras.models.load_model(cfg['model_file'])
x = eff.preprocess_input(your_rgb_image)  # shape (H,W,3), then batch
pred = model.predict(x)
label = cfg['class_names'][pred[0].argmax()]
